Long_Description: Zone Different zones are east zone, north zone, north-east zone, south zone and west zone

Storage capacity in Lakh Metric Tonnes The storage is important to hold huge inventory of food grains over a significant period of time Storage capacity pertains to FCI (both owned and hired) and State Agencies

Stocks held in Lakh Metric Tonnes Food grain stocking norms refers to the level of stock in the Central Pool that is sufficient to meet the operational requirement of food grains and exigencies at any point of time Storage capacity pertains to FCI (both owned and hired) and State Agencies
Utilization of storage capacity of food grains (%) Storage capacity pertains to FCI (both owned and hired) and State Agencies
